snippet.title: Game Dev Arcade - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Game Dev Arcade will be FREE on Steam and Itch.io. 
WISHLIST NOW:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1852870/Game_Dev_Arcade/
https://bulwarkcreative.itch.io/game-dev-arcade

This is my first game, and I hope you will enjoy it! Play the game on Steam or itch.io, and I'll provide a way to download the project files for Unreal Engine if you want to see how each game was made.

🌳 Linktree: https://linktr.ee/bulwarkcreative

Go check out GameDev.tv!! I'm learning how to make video games using their online courses.
https://www.gamedev.tv/?affcode=45216_yk0dqmxl

Bulwark Studios is a solo game development studio. I am creating short game development insights for the on-the-go gamer.

Social Media Pages:
🐦Twitter: https://twitter.com/BulwarkCreative
🚀 Roadmap: https://trello.com/bulwarkcreativeworkspace
🎶 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bulwarkcreative?
🎤 Discord: https://discord.gg/tPsVZtA55G
🎮 Itch.io: https://bulwarkcreative.itch.io/
💲 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bulwarkcreative?fan_landing=true

Music from:
StreamBeats - Harris Heller
Sessions Playlist - Riot Games
https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/fun-day

#UnrealEngine #IndieGame #GameDev
